column1: Title: "Effect of tirzepatide on glycaemic control and weight loss compared with other glucagon-like peptide-1 receptor agonists in Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus"
OUTCOME_HBA1C_ARM1_MD: "Tirzepatide vs GLP-1RA: MD -0.29% (95% CI -0.48 to -0.10)"
OUTCOME_WEIGHT_ARM1_MD: "Tirzepatide vs GLP-1RA: MD -1.94 kg (95% CI -3.19 to -0.69)"
EXTRACTION_NOTES: "Important comparison of dual GIP/GLP-1RA vs GLP-1RA monotherapy in Japanese population"
TITLE: Effect of tirzepatide on glycaemic control and weight loss compared with other glucagon-like peptide-1 receptor agonists in Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus
